theme.description: The styling theme for the document

citationStyle.description: The citation style for the document (e.g. "APA", "Vancouver")
citationStyle.$comment:
All styles listed at https://github.com/citation-style-language/styles are supported.
Case insensitive (e.g. "APA" will match to "apa") with some aliases recognized
(e.g. "ama" will all match to "american-medical-association").
